synopsis.text: Armed with unparalleled skills and courage, Shin, the most formidable player of the virtual reality game 'The New Gate', liberates tens of thousands of trapped players by defeating the final boss, Origin. However, as the game's world fades away, Shin is engulfed by a mysterious light, only to awaken in the same virtual realm 500 years later! With an unyielding spirit and legendary strength, Shin embarks on a new adventure in a familiar yet evolved world, seeking a way back home while uncovering the secrets of this new era. Will he triumph once more and return to reality, or will this timeless prison remain his eternal battleground? The epic tale of a hero's unwavering determination unfolds in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
